name: Whale's Waldo
description:
At some point in our lives, each one of us has been searching for that special place where we truly belong...

In a world where sea creatures live among us, your childhood friend Waldo has embarked on a worldwide adventure to exotic locales, and the two of you keep in touch via frequent letters. However, he has recently stopped writing and, upon realizing this, you decide to set out to try and find him.

Travel the world to visit exotic locales, and meet the locals at every stop on your quest to find Waldo. In the end, if you don't mess up, you might instead find something (and someone) you hadn't known you were looking for...

Whale's Waldo is a romantic Visual Novel game that was written, drawn, and coded in a month for NaNoRenO 2018. It features:

  • 30k+ words
  • Five distinct cities, with unique aquatic guys in each
  • 9 different endings and 18 unique achievements to unlock

In the game, you will depart from your home of New York City to visit the cities of Bodø, Norway; Anilao, Philippines; San Francisco, United States; and Colorado Springs, United States.

Stein the Sea Urchin, Octavio the Blue-Ringed Octopus, Leonard the Leaf Sheep Sea Slug, and Jacob the Great White Shark will be pleased to make your acquaintance at each location.

And with luck, you might find your friend Waldo, the Sperm Whale.

By Marine Dateologists; an international team of Visual Novel enthusiasts:

  • Project Manager and Writer (Stein)
    PMscenarios (itchio)
  • Lead Writer and Writer (Leonard) and Programmer
    Bob Conway (itchio)
  • Writer (Jacob) and General Artist
    Jaime Scribbles (itchio)
  • Writer (Octavio) and Sprite Artist (Waldo)
    CrouchingBacon (itchio)
  • Sprite Artist (Octavio and Jacob)
    Nimbusphoenix (tumblr)
  • Sprite Artist (Stein)
    Mado (itchio)
  • Sprite Artist (Leonard and Ms. Smith)
    Knickers PJ (tumblr)
